name: InfluenzaTestsForNovelInfluenzaAVirusNucleicAcid
title: Influenza (Tests for Novel influenza A virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names to detect nucleic acids of Novel Influenza A virus),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: Influenza virus A H2, H4-H18; Influenza H1 and H3 subtypes originating from a non-human species or from genetic reassortment between animal and human viruses),(Exclusion Criteria: 2009 pandemic H1N1)
